import { useContext, useEffect, useRef, useState } from "react"; import { ScriptsContext } from "../../context/ScriptsContext"; import { ApiContext } from "../../context/ApiContext"; import axios from "axios"; const CenterContent = () => { const [successMg, setSuccessMg] = useState(false); const [alertHidden, setAlertHidden] = useState(false); const [editButton, setEditButton] = useState(false); const { changeModal, openModal } = useContext(ScriptsContext); const { userAllDetails, success } = useContext(ApiContext); const [title, setTitle] = useState(); const [description, setDescription] = useState(); const [location, setLocation] = useState(); const [github, setGithub] = useState(); const [job, setJob] = useState(); const [foto, setFoto] = useState(); const onChangeButton = () => { const bodyFormData = new FormData(); bodyFormData.append("title", title); bodyFormData.append("description", description); bodyFormData.append("locations", location); bodyFormData.append("github", github); bodyFormData.append("job", job); bodyFormData.append("image", foto); axios.post("userProfile/update_profile", bodyFormData, { headers:{ Authorization: "Bearer " + localStorage.getItem("access_token") } }).then((response) => { setSuccessMg(true) setAlertHidden(true) }).catch((error) => { setSuccessMg(false) setAlertHidden(true) }) setTimeout(()=> { setAlertHidden(false) }, 2000) };///////////////////////////////////// const onCancelButton = () => { setFoto(null) setEditButton(false) setTitle(userAllDetails.title ? userAllDetails.title : ""); setDescription( userAllDetails.description ? userAllDetails.description : "" ); setLocation(userAllDetails.locations ? userAllDetails.locations : ""); setGithub(userAllDetails.github ? userAllDetails.github : ""); setJob(userAllDetails.job ? userAllDetails.job : ""); } //////////////////////////////////////////// useEffect(() => { setTitle(userAllDetails.title ? userAllDetails.title : ""); setDescription( userAllDetails.description ? userAllDetails.description : "" ); setLocation(userAllDetails.locations ? userAllDetails.locations : ""); setGithub(userAllDetails.github ? userAllDetails.github : ""); setJob(userAllDetails.job ? userAllDetails.job : ""); }, [userAllDetails]); return ( <>
